sourcesContent:
<template>
  <form @submit.prevent="submitForm">
    <input v-model="bookmark.title" placeholder="Title" required />
    <input v-model="bookmark.url" type="url" placeholder="URL" required />
    <input v-model="bookmark.tags" placeholder="Tags (comma-separated)" />

    <select v-model="bookmark.category">
      <option value="" disabled>Select Category</option>
      <option v-for="cat in categories" :key="cat" :value="cat">{{ cat }}</option>
    </select>

    <button type="submit">Add Bookmark</button>
  </form>
</template>

<script>
import { ref } from 'vue';

export default {
  emits: ['add-bookmark'],
  setup(_, { emit }) {
    const bookmark = ref({ title: "", url: "", tags: "", category: "" });
    const categories = ["Work", "Personal", "Education", "Entertainment"];

    const submitForm = () => {
      if (!bookmark.value.title || !bookmark.value.url) return;
      emit("add-bookmark", bookmark.value);
      bookmark.value = { title: "", url: "", tags: "", category: "" };
    };

    return { bookmark, categories, submitForm };
  }
};
</script>

<style scoped>
form {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 10px;
}
input, select, button {
  padding: 8px;
  font-size: 16px;
}
</style>
